BattleEffectText.Name: Insanity
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 1 stack after inflicting or recieving damage equal to 2% of Max HP

BattleEffectText.Name: Power Stripped
BattleEffectText.Desc: Dice are not affected by Power gain or loss

BattleEffectText.Name: Red Mark
BattleEffectText.Desc: Target of a Puppet Angelica Librarian

BattleEffectText.Name: Puppet Strings
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 1 Speed die, The character is controlable.

BattleEffectText.Name: Temporary Puppet Strings
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 1 Speed dice; Immortal for the duraction of this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Scorched
BattleEffectText.Desc: Being Hit by The Vermilion Cross will reduce the stack by 1 and make her attack other random Librarian with damage boosed by {0}%

BattleEffectText.Name: One Man Army
Fresh Meat
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can't act. Upon being hit enemies will recover HP equal to damage dealt. Change resistance to Noraml. Cannot take more Damage than 10% of their max HP in a scene and takes no Stagger Damage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Heehaw’s Hour to Shine
BattleEffectText.Desc: Heehaw's Combat Page will be played on the Last Speed die.

BattleEffectText.Name: Woof’s Warmup Performance
BattleEffectText.Desc: Woof's Combat Page will be played on the Last Speed die.

BattleEffectText.Name: Doodle-doo’s Cocky Session
BattleEffectText.Desc: Doodle-doo's Combat Page will be played on the Last Speed die.

BattleEffectText.Name: A little Trolling
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the end of this Scene, the librarian that dealt the most damage will be stupified.

BattleEffectText.Name: Stupefied
BattleEffectText.Desc: Lasts 2 Scenes. Uncontrollable. Upon losing a clash, takes bonus Stagger damage equal to 5% of Max Stagger Resist. If the character is Staggered, this status is removed at the end of the Scene, and the character recovers from Stagger next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Perfect Extraction -- Reverberation Ensemble
BattleEffectText.Desc: All characters with this passive will receive following bonus:
